EmailTemplate.name: Web-based EMS Software_0313.Reminder 1 Week
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Next Week: Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TriTech Reminder: Complimentary Live Webinar In One Week Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}},
This is reminder for the upcoming, complimentary live webinar "Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?" We look forward to having you attend, don't forget to bring your questions for TriTech Senior Product Manager, Charlie Barry and AmbCoach, Inc. President, Kimberly Walk as they provide both the business and user perspectives of the web-based trend in EMS Software. Â Tuesday, March 13, 2012 2:00PM ET l 1:00PM CT l Noon MT l 11:00AM PT
LOGIN DETAILS JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/cjfsxxm AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login
Questions?
Cheri Lane Marketing Communications Manager cheri.lane@tritech.com
Trouble logging in? Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
